channel.title: Posts on James Millner
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on James Millner

item.title: Raspberry Pi Day!
item.description: New article! Happy Raspberry Pi Day! # I’m a day late writing this, but seeing that yesterday was Raspberry Pi day has prompted me to put some words out about my experience with Raspberry Pi’s - and a bit of a tutorial on how to set up what I have running currently.

item.title: A whole new Hello World! :earth_africa:
item.description: Hello :wave: # Well this is new! Hello World! I’ve created this small site to organise my online space, share a bit more about the projects and work that I’m interested in, and to share some ramblings.
